author: Daniel Churchman
title: Do you believe that the new evidence Musk has released from Twitter proves that more than a dozen FBI, CIA, DHS, NSA and even British Military members in the effort to cover up the Hunter laptop from hell which had to be suppressed and covered up?
text:
In my day job, one of my responsibilities is traveling around making sure folk are doing their jobs correctly. Minor problems I try to correct on the spot, but egregious problems I record and report.

Guess what about 90% of the responses are of people I report… Yep, personal attacks on me. I threatened them; I harassed them; I called them names…

This is exactly the behavior I’m seeing from the people being exposed by Musk’s releases. The evidence is undeniable; it’s their own words, for Pete’s sake! So they’re going after Musk personally.

The other very common response I see when someone is “busted” is to try to shift blame. Even before Musk took over, media was talking about how Musk would become a threat to free speech, and how that much power could affect elections, sway public opinion. And voila! That is precisely what we now know they were doing.

If you want to know what deviousness the left is up to, just listen to what they are accusing someone else of doing. It really is that simple.
aiText:
You also cannot disagree with the facts of the case without at least looking at what Tesla had to do to stop it from doing so.

In short, there was a very clever strategy by Tesla to pull it off by putting the laptop on public display, as well as hiding inside it (and maybe then taking advantage of a loophole that the feds couldn't circumvent), and then using an all-private key to buy it to the public (which Tesla did, at last).

Tesla then installed the key, in their system, inside their system and did the same thing they did once with their public key. (Note that this is what Tesla used to give a US military base access to and how it would have been a huge use

author: Terry Bryant
title: How do you evaluate Joe Biden who freed Brittany Griner, a kneeling WNBA star, over Paul Whelan, an Iraqi war veteran, in excange for the Russian arms dealer Viktor Bout, who was sentenced 25 years for providing weapons used to kill Americans?
text: I would evaluate him as I have always evaluated him. He is a spineless politician with the moral courage of a pedophile. As for whether I am surprised at his decision to sell out a real American Hero, let his past record speak to that conclusion. Now here is the part that concerns me more than Biden’s actions. His leftist sycophant cultist worshipers love him for it. This man can do no wrong as long as he is doing their bidding. The AP, NBC and others lied to the American people once again that Biden was not given a choice between the anti-American criminal or the Whelan. That turned out to be a bald face lie by omission. And everyone on the left is perfectly OK with it.
aiText:

He was given a three- year probation and served six at the Russian airport in Moscow. All are accused of trying to arrange for Mr. Bout to buy more WJT missiles and $50 million worth of Whelan money to go get some WJT missiles.

author: Griz Ley
title: Do you believe that the new evidence Musk has released from Twitter proves that more than a dozen FBI, CIA, DHS, NSA and even British Military members in the effort to cover up the Hunter laptop from hell which had to be suppressed and covered up?
text:
Anyone who was moderately aware of the shared Reality knew about this back in 2019 — as well as the reality that Twitter and other social media platforms were just the propaganda wing of the Democrat Party, affecting the visibility (shadow-banning) the Left’s political enemies and outright blocking censoring and canceling not just post but people and even ideas (like #stopthesteal). Democrats used social media to alter the outcome of elections.

Only those with their heads up the fake news media’s backsides didn’t know this. The Twitter Files are just the hard-copy corroboration of what we all knew was going on.
aiText:
Here is the official Twitter feed for the Hunt and the Facebook page.

You can also follow @thehuntwithcory on Twitter to follow the entire thing.

So why don't we share this information to the world?

What is the truth behind the hoax and what do you think is true?

The Hunt and the Facebook pages are a great place to share interesting news, but, if you are looking for a better way to engage with the world or your country we welcome you to view here.

We also have many more pages to share here — to share content via this page and to learn more about the Hunter story or other related issues of interest to you!

He didn't explain why. I don't know why. Why do so many liberal-minded people think

author: R Jones
title: Why should Meghan Markle be called Duchess of Sussex in America when it is a republic?
text:
I know what to call her when she comes here: a cab. It can then take her to back to the airport where she can then be whisked away to a country where people have real problems, such as being victims of real racism and worse horrors such as sex trafficking and corporal punishment for speaking their minds.

If she still requires a title, might I suggest “Empress of Opportunistic Scheming Wenches?” or simply “Parasite?”
aiText:
The former Queen of the United Kingdom says she wants to be called 'Prince of the Netherlands because she is a beautiful woman' – The Guardian

Why is she called Duchess of Sussex?

Why should I call Meghan Markle Duchess?

Why should Meghan Markle be referred to as Duchess of Sussex in America?

When will Shevchenko call her Prince of Wales?

Why does she call Meghan Markle the Duchess of Sussex when she is in the royal family?

Why does Meghan Markle call her Prince of Wales when she is in the royal family?

If she still required a title, might I suggest “Emperor (Possibly) in English?”

author: Barb411
title: Why can’t liberals just peel off the Aunt Jemmima sticker if it bothers them that much? Must they really denigrate all blacks because they cant stand to look at one on their breakfast table every morning? If she was white they wouldn’t have objected.
text:
The kindest answer is they are ignorant.

“Aunt Jemima” was honored with that name. She became famous with it, offering her more opportunities for success. She was proud of it.

So what is derogatory about that?

SJWs get off your indignation long enough to do some research. After that, check yourself. If you don’t have anything more important to do than to stir shit to show the world how righteous you are, learn how to knit.

author: Griz Ley
title: What is the liberal ideal behind stricter gun control?
text:
To cedemore and more power to the government under the pretext of safety so we can live in a more infantilized form free of adult responsibility.

In a nutshell, Marxist Reconstruction Socialism. People have a lot of themselves to become so traumatized by the “existential horrors” of conscious adult agency that they want to flee back into dependent childhood.

That's nearly impossible to enforce upon an armed adult population.
aiText:

What is the liberal ideal behind stricter gun control?


One can easily imagine another, except less likely, if you want to use the liberal ideology to support something other than "control." This is the real "socialist liberalism" in its modern incarnation. It is only a term of affection to the modernist Left now, and is now an American equivalent of "anti-civilian" Communism.

In any case, in most cases the liberal ideal for gun control is to restrict guns, rather than reduce them. It is hard to find people who don't believe that. It is hard to find people who don't
